dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5356 IH: Preventing the EPA from Garnishing Wages Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McAllister introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend section 3720D of title 31, United States Code, to prohibit wage garnishment by the Environmental Protection Agency.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing the EPA from Garnishing Wages Act of 2014.

section.header: Prohibition on Wage Garnishment by the Environmental Protection Agency
section.text: Section 3720D of title 31, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: This section shall not apply to a debt owed pursuant to a program administered by the Environmental Protection Agency.
